angular.style.description: Sets the style file extension when generating a new component

angular.standalone.description: Sets the standalone option when generating a new component

angular.files.include.description: Glob patterns to include in the package. The default is ts, html, css, scss, less.

angular.files.exclude.description: Glob patterns to exclude from the package. The default is node_modules, dist, out, build, and any hidden files.

angular.files.watch.description: The list of directories to watch for changes

angular.files.showPath.description: Show the path of the file in the name of the list of generated files
